intro-section.title: What is direct fixing?What is direct fixing?What is direct fixing?What is direct fixing?
intro-section.description-1: Direct fixing enables precise, reliable installation and also saves time due to its rapid application.Direct fixing enables precise, reliable installation and also saves time due to its rapid application. Gas-actuated direct fixing allows instant, fast, autonomous fixing.Gas-actuated direct fixing allows instant, fast, autonomous fixing. The system is ideal for jobs that require strength and power when working with materials such as concrete, aerated concrete, hardwood or steel.The system is ideal for jobs that require strength and power when working with materials such as concrete, aerated concrete, hardwood or steel.Direct fixing enables precise, reliable installation and also saves time due to its rapid application.Direct fixing enables precise, reliable installation and also saves time due to its rapid application. Gas-actuated direct fixing allows instant, fast, autonomous fixing.Gas-actuated direct fixing allows instant, fast, autonomous fixing. The system is ideal for jobs that require strength and power when working with materials such as concrete, aerated concrete, hardwood or steel.The system is ideal for jobs that require strength and power when working with materials such as concrete, aerated concrete, hardwood or steel.

range-section.card-info-1: Direct fixing using a gas-actuated nail gun is simple: once the gas has been charged, just position the tip of the gun on the surface and pull the trigger.Direct fixing using a gas-actuated nail gun is simple: once the gas has been charged, just position the tip of the gun on the surface and pull the trigger.Direct fixing using a gas-actuated nail gun is simple: once the gas has been charged, just position the tip of the gun on the surface and pull the trigger.Direct fixing using a gas-actuated nail gun is simple: once the gas has been charged, just position the tip of the gun on the surface and pull the trigger.
range-section.card-info-2: Upon squeezing the trigger, unless the safety system is activated, a spark ignites the gas in the combustion chamber.Upon squeezing the trigger, unless the safety system is activated, a spark ignites the gas in the combustion chamber. The battery, included in the case, then activates a fan that extracts the combustion gases.The battery, included in the case, then activates a fan that extracts the combustion gases.Upon squeezing the trigger, unless the safety system is activated, a spark ignites the gas in the combustion chamber.Upon squeezing the trigger, unless the safety system is activated, a spark ignites the gas in the combustion chamber.
